item.title: Git Stash and Diff Patches
item.description: Basic Stash Operations git stash list ## Create stash git stash ## or with description git stash push -m "description" ## Apply latest stash (stash@{0}) git stash apply ## or specific stash git stash apply [INDEX] ## Apply and remove latest stash git stash pop ## Remove stash git stash drop [INDEX] Named Change Sets with Diff Patches Stashes can’t be referenced by name, only by index. To save specific changes with identifiable names (useful for build configs or feature variants):
